text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased API Error Rates>
Between 7:41 AM and 8:04 AM PDT we experienced increased API error rates in the AP-SOUTH-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: [RESOLVED] Increased API Error Rates>
Between 7:41 AM and 8:04 AM PST we experienced increased API error rates in the AP-SOUTH-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
